tool_description: The Email Check Invalid API is used to verify the validity of an email address, ensuring it meets specific formatting criteria.

api_list.name: mailCheck
api_list.description: This API function checks the validity of an email address by filtering the domain and ensuring it adheres to standard email formatting rules.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address to be validated.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: Filter for specific domains. Multiple domains can be entered, separated by commas (e.g., gmail.com, example.com, yahoo.com).
